name: International Conference on Computer Networks, Big Data and IoT
content: In this digital era, Internet of Things \[IoT\], big data and computer networks are dedicated to provide new innovative contributions focused towards the development and deployment of wide range of intelligent and networked information systems. The realization of integration of IoT and Big data in computer networks is forming a revolutionary paradigm in Information and Communication technologies \[ICT\] to enable a smart and self-configurable intelligent devices in this smart infrastructure.
